pr_title: Issue #2622: Update documentation for windows users

timeline.bodyText:
If I remember it correctly, this should be something like that
D:\> SET RUN_LOCALE="-Duser.language=en -Duser.country=US"
D:\> java %RUN_LOCALE% -jar checkstyle-X.XX-all.jar -c config.xml YOUR_FILE.java
timeline.author: pbludov
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -14,6 +14,9 @@ Check documentation: https://checkstyle.org/config_xxxxxx.html#NameOfAffectedChe
 /var/tmp $ java $RUN_LOCALE -jar checkstyle-X.XX-all.jar -c config.xml YOUR_FILE.java
 #[[PLACE YOUR OUTPUT HERE]]
 ```
+For Windows users, please use `type` instead of `cat` and run 
+`java -Duser.language=en -Duser.country=US -jar checkstyle-X.XX-all.jar
+-c config.xml YOUR_FILE.java` in place of the last command above.

replies.bodyText: I can confirm that it works, revised the template
replies.author: wltan

- Always specify what is expected.
+ For Windows users, please use "type" command instead of "cat". + Example of report that we expect: - - Expected: violation on first line. - /var/tmp/Test.java:1:28: error: '{' is not preceded with whitespace. - + type config.xml + + + + + + + + +D:\>type Test.java +class Test { + void method() { + try { return; // false positive + } + catch (Exception e) { return; // false positive + } + } +} + +D:\>java -jar -Duser.language=en -Duser.country=US checkstyle-8.XX-all.jar-c config.xml Test.java

replies.bodyText:
I'm a bit more hesitant to change this one because the original linux report example also spells out the command in full without using $RUN_LOCALE. It should be consistent across both examples.

https://checkstyle.org/report_issue.html#How_to_report_a_bug.3F
replies.author: wltan

replies.bodyText:
https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/master/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md
is our primary and most tunes format. We should align all to use it.
RUN_LOCALE was introduced for a reason to make command line short in width.
wihtout it, all valuable content appear in hidden are (you need to do horizontal scroll to get it) - it is pain and problem.
All should be visible wihtout any scrolling to see all details in the same time.
Please update linux example to follow https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/master/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md
replies.author: romani
